title: How strong is Velkoz mid in current meta
body: Does he get countered a lot by others

replies.body: Helpless against every single assassin, but outranges and outpokes most mages. Not something you want to pick blind.
several non assassin jungles can fk his day up in mid, especially if your vision and awareness are low.
Hes definitely got some waveclear so in worst case scenario he can hard stall the lane and keep the enemy mid from being allowed to roam as long as he still has mana.
